page.title: 04 Community Centre Activities
page.content: {A timetable of clubs and activities at the Bedwell Community Centre 1985.} {MONDAY}:aerobics,ballroom dancing for children,keep fit. {TUESDAY}:tap dancing,good companions (O.A.P.),ballet,over 60 craft group, table tennis,handicraft for disabled. {WEDNESDAY}:mother and toddler group, ballroom dancing,keep fit for over 50's handicraft for disabled,table tennis. {THURSDAY}:tap dancing,handy craft for disabled. {FRIDAY}:tap and ballet,ballroom dancing for adults. {SATURDAY}:on hire for private functions. {SUNDAY}:table tennis,spiritual church. {MONDAY-FRIDAY}:lounge open with library and games.Cafe for teas,snacks and lunch.A chiropodist visits the centre reguarly.
